name: Gotchi Ranch
description:
This is a small tamagotchi-like game about growing a ranch full of creatures to take care of. 

Features available:
- Train, feed, play with your creatures
- Make them evolve into new forms
- Unlimited procedurally generated creatures and evolutions
- Battle other creatures and increase the strength of yours
- Make them happy

What I would like to add:
- Simple multiplayer features like battling or visit other players' ranch
- A way to change the appaerance of your creatures
- New skills for battling

The game is still in development, have fun!

Creatures are generated with an early version of my tool: https://omagerio.itch.io/timogen
